Title: .NET Core March 2019 Updates - 1.0.15, 1.1.12, 2.1.9 and 2.2.3 | .NET Blog
Description:
Today, we are releasing the .NET Core March 2019 Update. These updates contain security and reliability fixes. See the individual release notes for details on included reliability fixes.  .NET Core 2.2.3 and .NET Core SDK 2.2.105 ( Download | Release Notes )
.NET Core 2.1.9 and .NET Core SDK 2.1.505 ( Download | Release Notes )
.NET Core 1.1.12 and .NET Core SDK 1.1.13 ( Download | Release Notes )
.NET Core 1.0.15 and .NET Core SDK 1.1.13 ( Download | Release Notes )  Security
Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2019-0757: .NET Core NuGet Tampering Vulnerability
A tampering vulnerability exists in NuGet software when executed in a Linux or Mac environment.
